ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] bard charm disablilities
ygData.msgSnippet: Can we send NPC s or any critters we charm against other players as well? That WOULD seem pretty powerful. And from what I ve read/heard, we used to be able to
ygData.messageBody:
Can we send NPC's or any critters we charm against other players as well?
That WOULD seem pretty powerful.

And from what I've read/heard, we used to be able to charm other players,
but I can see why they would take that away...that would be a little tough.




"Matt DeBarger" <mattdeba@...> on 04/16/2001 09:37:05 AM

Please respond to eqbards@yahoogroups.com

To: <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
cc:
Subject: Re: [eqbards] bard charm disablilities


Charm is an extremly powerful ability. Our charm can be very overbalancing
since mobs hit so damn hard at high levels and we have the ability to
recharm while getting the crap beat out of us. Be happy they gave us the
new charm :-) It's sad that I am pretty retiring the song at this point
(too many mobs too high lvl now), but I really can understand why the
limited us...


Elfson Allegro <The Circle of Eternity> 54 Veeshan
